item.title: ‘On the Road’ Review: An Extremely Tough, Incredibly Tender Story of Two Men Falling in Love on Mexico’s Deadly Highways
item.description: Diego Luna is among the producers of writer-director David Pablos’ new feature, about the evolving relationship between a truck driver and a sex worker.

item.title: Tony Gilroy Says He Can’t See Himself Doing Anything Like ‘Andor’ Ever Again
item.description: The creator, showrunner, head writer and EP discusses his naivete before signing on to the Disney+ ‘Star Wars’ prequel series, and how COVID saved him from himself.
